data.actual_result: You see your username, which only changes to the server nickname after the upload completed ( reported by Enharmonic#3999 )
data.expected_result: You see your server nickname showing for the message in progress being uploaded
data.short_description: Uploading an image shows your name to be the username, not nickname
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your nickname to be different than your username - Upload an image to Discord
